The Cafe
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe
Welcome!
The Cafe is the place where researchers in good standing may talk about almost anything!
If you have any doubts about where to post a question, post it in this month's Topics,
and a moderator can decide whether or not to move it.
***
If you are promoting a website, you are limited to one Cafe post.
***
The Formatting Playground is a place to practice enhancing messages with color, tables, etc.!
